freeConnectorProgram.enroll.success: Successfully enrolled in the Free Connector Program
freeConnectorProgram.enrollmentModal.fre: <p1>Alpha and Beta Connectors are free while you're in the program.</p1><p2>The whole Connection is free until both Connectors have moved into General Availability (GA)</p2>
freeConnectorProgram.enrollmentModal.ema: We will email you before your connection will start being charged.
freeConnectorProgram.enrollmentModal.car: When both Connectors are in GA, the Connection will no longer be free. You'll need to have a credit card on file to enroll so Airbyte can handle a Connection's transition to paid service.
